## Loading packages

```{r}

library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(forecast)
library(Kendall)
library(tseries)
library(outliers)
library(tidyverse)
library(cowplot)
library(sarima)
library(readxl)


```

```{r}
#Importing data and wrangling

#Importing data
data <- read_excel("./Data/load.xlsx")

#Unpivoting data
long_data <- data %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("h"),
               names_to = "Hour",
               values_to = "Value")

#Dropping meter ID column
long_data <- long_data %>% select(2,3,4)

#casting date column as date
long_data$date <- as.Date(long_data$date)

```

```{r}

#Showing initial plot
ggplot(long_data,aes(x = date, y = Value)) + 
  geom_line()

```
